data.title: Noble News
data.text:
December 31, 2009 -

- The Sultan of Kelantan married Elia Suhana Ahmad as his second wife

- Caspar Robert Ludwig Leonhard, son of Count Leonhard and Countess Melissa von Harrach was born at München, Germany

December 29, 2009 - Countess Marie-Cecilie von Harrach née Johannes died aged 93

December 27, 2009 - Prince Dom Pedro Gastão de Orléans e Bragança died at Villamanrique de la Condesa, Spain, aged 94

December 25, 2009 - Zayed and Moza, son and daughter of Sheikh Hamed bin Zayed Al Nahyan of Abu Dhabi and his wife

December 21, 2009 - Count Carl Josef Henckel von Donnersmarck (Luxemburg) married Claire Regina Barclay at Heiligenkreuz, Austria (?)

December 17, 2009 - James Alexander Philip Theo, Viscount Severn, son of the Earl and Countess of Wessex was born at Frimley Park NHS Hospital, Surrey, Great Britain

December 13, 2009 - Princess Maria Elisabeth zu Löwenstein-Wertheim-Freudenberg died at Berlin, Germany aged 68

December 11, 2009 -

- Sheikh Mohammed bin Hamdan bin Zayed Al Nayhan of Abu Dhabi married Sheikha ... bint Sultan bin Khalifa Al Nayhan at the Emirates Palace in Abu Dhabi

- Archduke Carl Ludwig of Austria died at Brussels, Belgium aged 88

December 10, 2009 - Sheikh Sheikh Saqr bin Mohammed Al Qasimi of Sharjah died aged 73

December 04, 2009 - Mohammed, son of Sheikh Mansour bin Zayed Al-Nahyan of Abu Dhabi and his wife Sheikha Manal

December 03, 2009 - Olympia, daughter of Duke and Prince Henri and Duchess and Princess Dainée d'Arenberg, was born at Brussels, Belgium

December 02, 2009 - Aljalila, daughter of Sheikh Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Emir of Dubai and Princess Haya bint Al Hussein of Jordan

December 01, 2009 - Count Pius Dominicus Leopold Maria Maximilian von Habsburg-Lothringen was christened at St. Andrä im Lavanttal, Austria

November 28, 2009 - Maximilian Andres Johannes Markus Maria, son of Count Andres von und zu Trauttmansdorff-Weinsberg and Ana Sofia Orozco

November 23, 2009 - 23.11. - Count Ernst Friedrich von Platen Hallermund died at Tornesch, Germany, aged 83

November 17, 2009 -

- George Gilman and Lady Rose Windsor are engaged

- Prince Georges de Croÿ died at Anduze (Gard), France, aged 87

November 16, 2009 - Fürst Siegfried zu Castell-Rüdenhausen died at Rüdenhausen Castle, Germany, aged 91

November 10, 2009 - John Walker married Princess Irina of Romania at the Heart of Reno Chapel, Reno, Nevada, USA

November 03, 2009 - Count Jacques de Lalaing married Countess Lavinia von Waldburg zu Wolfegg und Waldsee

October 31, 2009 - 31.10. - Count Friedrich Leopold zu Stolberg-Stolberg died aged 86

October 27, 2009 -

- Count Karl zu Stolberg-Stolberg was christened at the St. Laurentius church in Berlin, Germany

- Noah de Nassau was christened at the Parish church of Gilsdorf, Luxemburg

- Anthony Bailey married Princess Marie-Therese von Hohenberg religiously at the St. Peter's Church in Salzburg, Austria

October 25, 2009 - Amalia Anna Elisabeth, daughter of Hereditary Prince Maximilian and Hereditary Princess Marissa zu Bentheim-Tecklenburg was born at the Evangelischen Krankenhaus in Lippstadt, Germany

October 22, 2009 - Sheikh Khalid bin Abdullah bin Mohammed Al Thani of Qatar married Sheikha ... bint Badr bin Khalifa bin Ali Al-Thani of Qatar in Sharjah

October 20, 2009 - Princess Ariane of the Netherlands was christened at the Kloosterkerk in The Hague, The Netherlands

October 13, 2009 -

- Prince Khalid bin Abdullah bin Abdulaziz bin Turki al-Saud of Saudi Arabia died aged 60

- Sheikh Salman bin Mohammed Al Khalifa of Bahrain died

October 10, 2009 - Prince Soulivong Savang of Laos married Princess Chansouk Soukthala of Laos at Missisauga, Toronto, Canada

October 09, 2009 -

- Magali Margriet Eleonoor, daughter of Prince Floris and Princess Aimée van Oranje-Nassau, van Vollenhoven was born at Amsterdam, The Netherlands

- Lara Sophie, daughter of Archduke Ferdinand and Archduchess Katharina of Austria was born at Berlin, Germany

October 08, 2009 - Sheikh Salem Sabah Al-Salem Al-Sabah of Kuwait died aged 69

October 05, 2009 -

- Maria-Gabriella Princess von Sachsen-Coburg und Gotha née baroness von Fürstenberg died at Salzburg aged 86

- Diemuth Prinzessin zu Hohenlohe-Oehringen née Janssen died aged 64

October 03, 2009 - Prince Joachim of Denmark and Marie Cavallier are engaged

October 02, 2009 - Lady Katherine Brandram née Princess of Greece and Denmark died at Meadbank Nursing Centre, Battersea, London, Great Britain, aged 94

September 30, 2009 - Christian Schneider married Princess Lioba Lobkowicz at the Parish Church of St. Ignatius at Breznice, Czechia

September 29, 2009 - Anthony Bailey married Princess Marie-Therese von Hohenberg civilly at the National Palace of Pena, Sintra, Portugal

September 22, 2009 - Albert Louis Philip Edward, son of Lord and Lady Nicholas Windsor was born at the Chelsea and Westminster Hospital in London, Great Britain

September 21, 2009 - Noah, son of Prince Louis of Luxemburg and Tessy Antony was born at the Maternité Grande-Duchesse Charlotte in Luxemburg-City, Luxemburg

September 15, 2009 -

- Carl Dominik, son of Count Wichard and Countess Christine von Harrach at Nürnberg, Germany

- Oktavian von Eiselsberg married Princess Isabelle von Auersperg-Trautson at Mariahilfberg, Gutenstein, Austria

- Damien Jdanoff married Countess Juliane zu Stolberg-Wernigerode in a protestant ceremony in Ortenberg, Germany

September 14, 2009 - Damien Jdanoff married Countess Juliane zu Stolberg-Wernigerode in a Russian-Orthodox ceremony in Wiesbaden, Germany

September 13, 2009 - Moritz, son of Prince Otto and Princess Carla von Hessen

September 12, 2009 - Princess Helen Shah of Nepal died at the Military Hospital of Chhauni, Kathmandu, Nepal, aged 75

September 08, 2009 -

- Prince Karl-Emich of Leiningen married Countess Isabelle von und zu Egloffstein civilly at Amorbach, Germany

- Pieter Haitsma Mulier married Princess Vanessa zu Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg religiously at the ev. Stadtkirche in Bad Berleburg, Germany

- Klaus Runow married Duchess Maria Anna in Bavaria religiously at the Parish Church St. Quirinus in Tegernsee, Germany

September 07, 2009 - Prince Charles-Philippe d'Orléans Duc d'Anjou and Diana Álvares Pereira de Melo 11th Duchess de Cadaval are engaged

September 02, 2009 - Prince Leopold von Bayern was christened at the Johanneskirche in Berg am Starnberger See, Germany

September 01, 2009 - Count Frédéric zu Königsegg-Aulendorf married Countess Jela Esterházy de Galántha at Küsnacht, Switzerland

August 31, 2009 - Princess Agnes von und zu Liechtenstein née Archduchess of Austria died at Vienna, Austria, aged 78

August 27, 2009 - Sheikh Sayyid bin Maktoum al-Maktoum of Dubai married Natasha Muslimorova at Minsk, Belarus

August 25, 2009 -

- Emma van Vollenhoven was christened at the chapel of Palace Het Loo in Apeldoorn, The Netherlands

- Hereditary Count Leopold Fugger von Babenhausen married Annina Kammer in the Hessen area, Germany

- Prince Theodor "Theo" Romanoff died at Pompano Beach, Florida, USA, aged 32 (suicide)

August 20, 2009 - Countess Teresa von Seilern und Aspang née Countess von Bulgarini d'Elci (Hohenlohe-Waldenburg-Schillingsfürst) died aged 43 (suicide)

August 18, 2009 - Princess Hissah bint Turki bin Abdulaziz Al-Saud of Saudi Arabia died aged 91

August 08, 2009 - Princess Veronika zur Lippe née Holl died at Starnberg, Germany, aged 91

August 06, 2009 - Count Alram zu Ortenburg died at Coburg aged 81

August 04, 2009 - Prince Emmanuel of Liechtenstein married Sonja Maria Monschein religiously at Riegersburg, Austria

August 03, 2009 - Damien Jdanoff married Countess Juliane zu Stolberg-Wernigerode civilly in Dresden, Germany

July 28, 2009 - Crown Prince Bao Long of Vietnam died aged 71

July 27, 2009 - Pius Dominicus Leopold Maria Maximilian, son of Count Dominik and Countess Pia von Habsburg-Lothringen

July 23, 2009 - (Former) King Mohammed Zahir Shah of Afghanistan died aged 92 at Kabul, Afghanistan

July 21, 2009 -

- Princess Paulina and Prince Moritz von Hessen were christened at Wolfsgarten Castle, Germany

- Hereditary Prince Carl Ferdinand zu Bentheim und Steinfurt married Elna-Margret Rinn religiously at the Grosse Evangelische Kirche in Steinfurt-Burgsteinfurt, Germany

- Princess Paulina and Prince Moritz von Hessen were christened at Wolfsgarten Castle, Germany

July 19, 2009 - Hereditary Prince Carl Ferdinand zu Bentheim und Steinfurt married Elna-Margret Rinn civilly at Bentheim Castle in Bad Bentheim, Germany

July 15, 2009 - Infanta Sofía de Todos los Santos of Spain was christened at the Zarzuela Palace, Spain

July 09, 2009 - Madison, daughter of Prince Daniel and Princess Soo Romanoff, at Chicago, USA

July 07, 2009 -

- Princess Charlotte Emilia Sophie zu Waldeck und Pyrmont was christened

- Oliver ... married Countess Verena Schlitz gen. von Görtz religiously at the Wehrkapelle Arnum in Hemmingen-Arnum, Germany

- Timothy Landon (Esterházy de Galántha) died aged 62

July 03, 2009 - Sheikh Maktoum bin Ahmed bin Jumaa Al-Maktoum of Dubai married Sheikha ... bint Saeed bin Obaid bin Jumaa Al-Maktoum of Dubai

July 01, 2009 - Princess Isabella Henrietta Ingrid Margrethe of Denmark was christened at Fredensborg Slotskirke, Denmark

June 30, 2009 -

- Prince Maximilian von Croÿ married Countess Josefine von und zu Trauttmansdorff-Weinsberg at Leobersdorf, Austria

- Fürst Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe married Dr. Nadja Anna Zsoeks religiously at the Stadtkirche at Bückeburg, Germany

June 28, 2009 - Fürst Alexander zu Schaumburg-Lippe married Dr. Nadja Anna Zsoeks civilly at the Townhall of Bückeburg, Germany

June 20, 2009 - Sheikh Mohammed bin Saleh bin Mohammed Al Sharqi of Fujairah married Sheikha ... bint Hamad bin Saif Al Sharqi of Fujairah

June 16, 2009 - Count Friedrich von Rechteren-Limpurg-Speckfeld married Cosima Jacobi

June 15, 2009 -

- Vish Khanna married Princess Michelle Lobkowicz in a catholic at the Church of Our Lady Immaculate in Guelph, Ontario, Canada, and a traditional Hindu ceremony

- Eduardo de Carvalho Moreira married Princess Maria Antonia de Orléans e Bragança at the Capela da Reitoria, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

June 13, 2009 -

- Leopold Maria Bengt Karl Manuel, son of Prince Manuel and Princess Anna von Bayern, at München, Germany (?)

- Antonia Lambrino/Hohenzollern née Colville (Romania) died aged 68

June 10, 2009 - Awangku Khairul Khalil Pengiran Syed Haji Jaafari married Pengiran Anak Puteri Hajah Majeedah Nuurul Bulqiah of Brunei Darussalam at the Istana Nurul Iman in Bandar Seri Begawan, Brunei Darussalam

June 09, 2009 -

- Princes Luisa of Savoy was christened at the Parish Church at Lauenen, Switzerland

- Johann Rudnay de Rudno married Princess Caroline von Schönburg-Hartenstein at the St Marien Dom in Zwickau, Germany

June 04, 2009 - Constantin, son of Archduke Maximilian and Archduchess Maya of Austria at Madrid, Spain

June 02, 2009 -

- Lerotholi David Mohato Bereng Seeiso Prince of Lesotho was christened as David at the Roman Catholic Church St Luis at Matsieng, Lesotho

- Eugenia de Borbón Vargas was christened at the Embassy of the Holy See in Paris, France

- Archduke Carl Christian of Austria married Estelle de Saint-Romain religiously at the Église Saint Bruno de Voiron (Isère), France

May 26, 2009 - 26.05. - Jacques Count de Lalaing and Lavinia Countess von Waldburg zu Wolfegg und Waldsee are engaged

May 24, 2009 - 24.05. - Princess Jawhara bint Fahd ibn Abdullah ibn Jalawi of Saudi Arabia died aged 80

May 19, 2009 -

- Crown Prince Raja Muda Nazrin Shah of Perak married Zara Salim Davidson at the Istana Iskandariah palace in Kuala Kangsar (bersanding)

- Count Johannes von Schönburg-Glauchau married Ivonne von Opel religiously

May 18, 2009 - Nobile Elio Marchetti died at Merced California aged 85

May 17, 2009 -

- Crown Prince Raja Muda Nazrin Shah of Perak married Zara Salim Davidson at the Istana Iskandariah palace in Kuala Kangsar (akad nikah)

- Princess Shaikhah bint Faisal bin Mohammad bin Saad of Saudi Arabia died aged 4

- Princess Rima bint Hathlool bin Abdulaziz of Saudi Arabia died aged 42

May 12, 2009 - Prince Boris Petrovitch-Njegosh of Montenegro married Véronique Haillot Canas da Silva civilly at Portugal

May 11, 2009 - Malietoa Tanumafili II, head of state of Samoa died aged 94 at the Tupua Tamasese Meaole II National Hospital at Moto'otua, Samoa

May 08, 2009 - Prince Abdullah Al Faisal bin Abdul Aziz of Saudi Arabia died aged 84 or 85

May 07, 2009 - King Tomasi Kulimoetoke of Wallis died aged 88

May 06, 2009 - Prince Saud bin Mishaal bin Yazid bin Saud bin Abdulaziz of Saudi Arabia died aged 12

May 05, 2009 -

- Count Dominik von Habsburg-Lothringen married civilly Pia Gabriella Hella Huberta Rittinghausen at Heidelberg, Germany

- Count Johannes von Schönburg-Glauchau married Ivonne von Opel civilly at Glauchau Castle, Germany

- Count Dominik von Habsburg-Lothringen married religiously Pia Rittinghausen at the parish church of St. Andrä im Lavanttal, Austria

- Prince Abdul-Majid bin Abdul-Aziz of Saudi Arabia died aged 65 in the USA

May 03, 2009 - Prince Nikita Nikititch Romanov died aged 83 at New York, USA

May 01, 2009 - Sheikh Saeed bin Nahyan bin Mubarak Al Nayhan of the UAE died in a car crash

April 29, 2009 - Sofía, daughter of the Prince and Princess of Asturias at the Clínica Rúber Internacional in Madrid, Spain

April 28, 2009 -

- Archduke Carl Christian of Austria married Estelle de Saint-Romain civilly at Montgirod (Savoie), France

- Hereditary Prince Vladimir Lobkowicz married Alix Paul-Cavallier at the Monastry Church of Strahov in Prague, Czechia

April 27, 2009 - Jaafar, son of Prince Ali bin Nayef and Princess Reema Ali of Jordan

April 26, 2009 -

- Mercedes, daughter of Prince Lamoral and Princess Ruve zu Hohenlohe-Jagstberg was born in Sydney, Australia

- Elisabeth Baroness von Warsberg née Countess zu Stolberg-Stolberg died aged 88

April 25, 2009 - Prince Wolfgang zu Bentheim und Steinfurt and his second wife Sissy Böhm were divorced

April 24, 2009 - Hans-Detlev Count von Platen-Hallermund died aged 68 at Hamburg

April 21, 2009 - Isabella Henrietta Ingrid Margrethe, daughter of Crown Prince Frederik and Crown Princess Mary of Denmark at Rigshospitalet in Copenhagen, Denmark

April 18, 2009 - Lerotholi David Mohato Bereng Seeiso, son of King Letsie III of Lesotho and Queen 'Masenate Mohato Bereng Seeiso

April 17, 2009 -

- Hamzah, son of Prince Abbas bin Ali and Princess Sima Abbas of Jordan

- Erica Princess zu Salm-Salm née von Morgen died aged 72

April 14, 2009 - King Mswati III of Swaziland secretly married Phindile Nkambule as his 13th wife

April 12, 2009 - Sheikh Mayed bin Saeed bin Abdullah Al Mualla of Umm al-Qaiwain married Sheikha ... bint Saif bin Saeed Al Khatri

April 10, 2009 -

- Ariane Wilhelmina Máxima Ines, daughter of Prince Willem-Alexander and Princess Máxima of the Netherlands at the Bronovo Hospital in The Hague, The Netherlands

- Sigonia Marie Countess von Ortenburg was born and died at the Oakville-Trafalgar Memorial Hospital, Oakville, Canada (daughter of Count Peter and Countess Nancy von Ortenburg)

- Leopold Count von Walderdorff (Waldburg-Wolfegg und Waldsee) died aged 79

April 09, 2009 -

- Gustav Prince zu Hohenlohe-Langenbug was christened at Langenburg, Germany

- Wilhelm Karl Prince of Prussia died at Holzminden, Germany, aged 85

April 08, 2009 - 08.04. - Hugo Prince von Ratibor und Corvey was christened at the Abbey Church of Corvey, Germany

April 06, 2009 - 06.04. - Haalah, daughter of Prince Hashem bin Hussein and Princess Fahdah Hashem of Jordan

April 02, 2009 -

- Sheikh Falah bin Zayed Al Nayhan of Abu Dhabi married daughter of Ghanim bin Faris Al Mazrouei

- Prince Torsten zur Lippe-Weissenfeld died in Frankfurt an der Oder, Germany, aged 38

April 01, 2009 - Princess Marie Hélène de Croy died at Charleston, South Carolina, USA, aged 95

March 31, 2009 -

- Lilly, daughter of Prince Karl Albrecht and Princess Martina zu Hohenlohe-Waldenburg-Schillingsfürst, von Ratibor und Corvey was born at Vienna, Austria

- Maria Assunta Duchess von Oldenburg died

March 29, 2009 - Klaus Runow and Maria Anna Duchess in Bavaria are engaged

March 26, 2009 - Paulina Elisabeth Adelheid Tatiana Suzanne and Moritz Ludwig Georg Wolf, daughter and son of Hereditary Prince Heinrich Donatus and Hereditary Princess Floria von Hessen were born at Frankfurt am Main, Germany

March 21, 2009 - Maria Assunta, daughter of Duke Paul and Duchess Pilar von Oldenburg

March 19, 2009 - Abdullah, son of Prince Ali bin Hussein and Princess Rym Ali of Jordan

March 17, 2009 - Abdul Muntaqim, son of Crown Prince Haji Al-Muhtadee Billah of Brunei Darussalam and Sarah Salleh, was born at the Raja Isteri Pengiran Anak Saleha Hospital in Bandar Seri Begawan, Brunei Darussalam

March 13, 2009 - Ekaterina Romanov de Farace di Villaforesta née Princess of Russia died in Montevideo, Uruguay, aged 91

March 12, 2009 - Xan Richard Anders, baron Culloden, son of the Earl and Countess of Ulster

March 10, 2009 -

- Prince Abdulaziz bin Ahmad bin Abdulrahman of Saudi Arabia died at the King Faisal Specialist Hospital in Riyadh, aged 49

- Countess Caroline von Habsburg-Lothringen died at Traunkirchen, aged 29

March 09, 2009 - Karl, son of Count Franz-Joseph and Countess Sybille zu Stolberg-Stolberg

March 07, 2009 -

- Sheikha Saeeda bint Khalifa Al-Khalifa of Bahrain died

- Marie-Louise Princess de Looz et Corswarem née van den Bogaerde van Terbrugge died at Rheine, Germany, aged 85

March 05, 2009 - Eugenia, daughter of Luis Alfonso de Borbón Duke of Anjou and his wife Margarita, was born at Mount Sinai Hospital, Miami, Florida, USA

March 03, 2009 -

- Christian Falk married Nora Prinzessin von Hannover religiously at the Wallfahrtskirche Oberreit in Aschbach, Germany

- Martin Jørgensen married Princess Alexandra Countess of Frederiksborg (Denmark) at Øster Egede Church near Fakse, Denmark
